text: Sredets Municipality (Bulgarian: Община Средец, Obshtina Sredets) is a municipality in Burgas Province, Bulgaria. It includes the town of Sredets and 31 villages. ==Demographics== === Religion === According to the latest Bulgarian census of 2011, the religious composition, among those who answered the optional question on religious identification, was the following: == References == ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Burgas Province
title: Sredets Municipality
